au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=4m_offset_DSC
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: import time # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(3200,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 5 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 35.393) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.1916)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(38.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(38.5, 0) driveBsz(256)
